content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. So, what price were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a fair and reasonable price. Since the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, I believe a price that reflects these conditions would be ideal. How much are you offering for the rent?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I understand your desire for a fair price. As the landlord, I'm willing to negotiate a rate that is both fair to you and profitable for me. Would you be comfortable with a starting price of €800 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must be honest with you. The price you've mentioned seems a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. I was hoping for something more in the range of €650 to €700 per month. Would you be willing to consider that?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I hear your concern. While €650 to €700 is lower than my initial offer, I'm open to discussing a price that meets your expectations while still providing a good return on my investment. How about we start with €725 per month and see if we can find a middle ground?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer is more in line with what I was hoping for. I believe €725 is a good starting point for further negotiations. Would you be willing to go down to €700 if I were to sign a longer lease term?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, a longer lease term would certainly be beneficial for both of us. I'm open to discussing a price that reflects the commitment of a longer lease. How many years were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would be comfortable signing a lease for two years. With that in mind, would you be willing to lower the rent to €675 per month? I believe this would be a fair deal considering the term of the lease.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, a two-year lease is a significant commitment, and I appreciate your willingness to lock in for that period. I'm willing to reduce the rent to €690 per month for a two-year lease. This reflects both the value of the apartment and the security of a long-term tenant. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €690 per month for a two-year lease is quite fair. I believe this would be a good deal for both parties. I agree to the price of €690 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Maryam. This is a great start to our business relationship. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment. Thank you for choosing my property. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
